statement.tex:
\text{Find the values of x for which the following}\\ \text{equation satisfies.}\\
\left[\begin{array}{ccc} x & -5 & -1 \end{array} \right]
\left[\begin{array}{ccc} 1 & 0 & 2 \\ 0 & 2 & 1 \\ 2 & 0 & 3 \end{array} \right]
\left[\begin{array}{c} x\\ 4 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] = O

step.context: \text{If A is of order } p \times q, \text{ B is of order } q \times r \text{ and C}\\ \text{is of order }r \times s \text{ then, is the following true?}

step.reason: \text{For equality of two matrices the corresponding}\\ \text{elements must be equal. Thus, O is the null}\\ \text{matrix of order }1 \times 1.
